description: A pun on 'boa constrictor' altered to 'constructor' for humor.
title: Slithery Builder
n_1: Sammy the snake wears a hard hat, surveying a construction site.
c1_1: Ready to roll up my sleeves!
c2_1: But you don’t have any arms?
n_2: Cleo, a fellow construction worker, chuckles at the sight.
n_3: Sammy skillfully lays bricks and measures angles.
n_4: They laugh together, proud of their teamwork.
